title: Web Development Internship
description: Build real-world web applications using React, Node.js, and modern development tools.

2Weeks.learningOutcome: Students learn the fundamentals of frontend + backend basics. They become capable of building small functional apps with simple APIs.
2Weeks.projectCapacity: They can complete **1 small project** (functional but limited UI).

1Month.learningOutcome: Students reach a solid beginner–intermediate level. They can build full-stack apps with authentication and deployment.
1Month.projectCapacity: They can complete **one major full-stack project** + **one mini-project**.
exampleProjects: E-commerce mini-store with auth, cart, and admin
Social media dashboard with CRUD posts

title: IoT & Embedded Systems Internship
description: Hands-on experience with IoT devices, sensors, and embedded programming.

2Weeks.learningOutcome: Students understand core microcontroller programming and basic sensor handling. They can build simple working prototypes.
2Weeks.projectCapacity: They can build **1 working IoT prototype** connected to a cloud dashboard.

1Month.learningOutcome: Students become capable of building full IoT systems with sensors, cloud integration, automation, and dashboards.
1Month.projectCapacity: They can finish **one advanced IoT project** + **one smaller prototype**.
exampleProjects: Home automation system with cloud control
Smart agriculture monitoring with auto irrigation
IoT surveillance alert system with notifications

title: PCB Design Internship
description: Hands-on internship focused on PCB design workflow — schematic capture, PCB layout, producing Gerbers, and preparing a manufacturable board. Ideal for makers and embedded engineers who want practical PCB skills.
projects: IoT sensor node PCB with header connector
Motor driver PCB (power traces, thermal considerations)

2Weeks.learningOutcome: Understand PCB workflow: schematic capture, basic PCB layout, hand-soldering, and generating Gerber/BOM for manufacturing.
whatTheyCanLearn: PCB stacking, footprints and footprint creation
2Weeks.projectCapacity: They can complete **1 basic PCB design** with hand-soldering practice.

1Month.learningOutcome: Complete PCB design projects with manufacturable outputs and testing: multi-layer basics, design for manufacturability, assembly, and debugging.
whatTheyCanLearn: DFM checks and component placement for yield
Preparing assembly drawings and pick & place files
1Month.projectCapacity: They can complete **one major PCB project** + **one smaller design**.
exampleProjects: IoT sensor node with power regulator
Motor driver PCB with heat management
